sentence: Video  and  photographic  evidence,  along  with  eyewitness  accounts,  are  providing  some  clues  about  Tuesday's  massive  explosion  at  Gaza's  Al  Ahli  Arab  Hospital,  which  Palestinian  officials  say  killed  hundreds.
Israel  has  conducted  thousands  of  air  strikes  on  Gaza  in  the  twelve  days  since  a  wave  of  attacks  by  Hamas  militants  killed  more  than  a  thousand  Israelis.
"Some  of  them  died  in  our  hands,"  he  said.
